title: Competency-Based Platform Design for Enhancing E-Learning Industry Workforce Management Capabilities

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Competency Development Program Specialized in E-Learning Industry Workforce Management for Mathematics Education: Enhancing Competency-Based Platform Design Skills for Pre-Service and In-Service Teachers with Formative Assessment Feedback

learning_goals: Explain five core competencies in e-learning industry workforce management and apply them to real-world cases.
Plan a customized workforce management system for mathematics education following a competency-based platform design process.
Analyze components of HR cloud platforms (competency tools, matching algorithms, evaluation models) and propose improvement strategies.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
